basic.Peptide Name: P45(derived from E2 envelope protein of GB virus C)
basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from E2 envelope protein of GB virus C)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.20718496]HIV-1:inhibition of gp41-induced cell-cell fusion in CEM-174 cells(IC50=141.2 μM);inhibition of HIV(HXB2) infection in TZM-bl Cells(IC50=48.8 μM);inhibition of HIV(BAL) infection in TZM-bl Cells(IC50=505.5 μM);inhibition of HIV(69-7) infection in TZM-bl Cells(IC50=43.7 μM).
